attributes.action: Educate more people about the disadvantages of 'Unplanned pregnancy'
attributes.additional_details: Unplanned pregnancies can present several challenges and disadvantages for individuals and couples. Some of the common disadvantages include: Financial strain; Lack of preparedness; Impact on education or career; relationship strain; Emotional and psychological impact; Reduced access to support systems. Planned pregnancies offer several benefits for individuals, couples, and society as a whole.
attributes.background: Include information about the disadvantages of 'unplanned pregnancy' in the school curriculum. Planned pregnancies offer several benefits for individuals, couples, and society as a whole. Unintended pregnancy is associated with an increased risk of problems. There needs to be an increased awareness.
